mapper.select: select p.product_id as productId, p.product_name as name, p.product_price as price, p.product_discount as discount, p.parents_product_id as parentsProductId, pd.product_detail_id as productDetailId, pd.product_detail_size as size, pd.product_detail_color as color, pd.product_detail_stock as stock from product p join product_detail pd on p.product_id = pd.product_id and pd.product_detail_id = #{productDetailId}

select delivery_id as id, user_id as "user.id", delivery_name as name, delivery_recipient as recipient, delivery_phone as phone, delivery_address1 as address1, delivery_address2 as address2, delivery_zipcode as zipcode, delivery_memo as memo, delivery_default_yn as defaultYn from delivery where user_id = #{userId} and delivery_default_yn = 'Y'
